net.sf.sprockets.app

Class Fragments

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.app.Fragments

  • public class Fragments
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with Fragments.

    • Method Detail

      • arguments

        public static Bundle arguments(Fragment frag)
        Get the arguments for the Fragment, instantiating them if necessary. As with setArguments, this can only be called before the Fragment has been attached to its Activity.

      • open

        public static FragmentTransaction open(Activity activity)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_OPEN transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is not available

      • open

        public static FragmentTransaction open(Fragment frag)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_OPEN transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is not available

      • open

        public static FragmentTransaction open(FragmentManager fm)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_OPEN transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is null

      • close

        public static FragmentTransaction close(Activity activity)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_CLOSE transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is not available

      • close

        public static FragmentTransaction close(Fragment frag)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_CLOSE transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is not available

      • close

        public static FragmentTransaction close(FragmentManager fm)
        Begin a transaction that uses the TRANSIT_FRAGMENT_CLOSE transition.
        Returns:
        null if the FragmentManager is null
